title: Is We Dumb? | Clipboard. Seizure. Reward Money. Blow My Horses.
description:
Would you find it weird to be using the airport restroom and then hear masturbating noises blended with farm animal noises? Probably weirder if you didn't find it weird. Let's talk about that, getting yelled at for trying to save a man's life, commenting on your own most wanted post on Facebook, valet losing your keys, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/aXaOJ7B0D1M

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com
